level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"Chancellor" means the chief executive officer of the District of Columbia Public Schools appointed pursuant to ยง 38-174.
"DCPS" means the District of Columbia Public Schools established by ยง 38-171.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-142
level.text: For history of Law 19-142, see notes under ยง 38-751.01.
